text: Nick Cannon And Mariah Carey Bicker Back - And - Forth At Kids ’ Choice Awards The other day we reported on the “ family fun day ” that Mariah Carey and Nick Cannon had with “ dem babies ” and the Nickelodeon Kids ’ Choice Awards. Welp, according to OKMagazine, looks can be very deceiving … Despite the smiles and laughs that the co - parents flashed on the red carpet, there was an ugly dispute taking place underneath. But, a source told OK! exclusively that Mariah and Nick, who put on a united front around the cameras, were not as happy once inside. The two “ apparently had an argument of some sort while they were sitting in their seats. ” And while it ’ s unclear what they disagreed on, it didn ’ t seem to blow over, as “ she
